attributes.action: Say NO to privatisation of our Royal Mail
attributes.additional_details:
We would like you to NOT SELL the Royal Mail of the United Kingdom. You cannot guarantee that ALL current services can remain operational on a regular basis, as they are operated now and without a rise of cost to the purchaser.

DO NOT SELL !!!  WE URGE YOU. You will no longer be able to rely on collecting from this annually towards other expenditure.

Please have some fore-thought for the future and think of the people, who you serve!!!!!

WE, THE PEOPLE WHO YOU SERVE, AND WHO HAVE SIGNED THIS PETITION DEMAND THAT YOU DO NOT SELL OUR ROYAL MAIL.
